I remember the look on my Dads face when I told him I wished he'd told me about being adopted.

tweet:
Also in the last two years:

- Learned I was ADHD and autistic.

- Found a community of people like me.

- Started to learn how to recognize my needs more.

Still a long way to go. 

Trying to see the positives on a hard day.

2/2

tweet:
In the last two years:

- Caught COVID, increasing my pre-existing MCAS symptoms to new levels, and leaving me easily breathless/exhausted.

- Hit autistic burnout.

- Spent over a year in a moldy environment leading to increased cognitive impairment (on top of #ADHD).

1/2

tweet:

tweet: How people interact with each other, how that will flow on through the social graph. It's like a rock in a pond. Ripples spread out before the water settles again. People act differently because other people act differently and I try to understand the turbulence.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

tweet:
Life is strange. 

Some people before you get an autism dx: 
"self-dx takes something away from those who are dianosed".  

Some, after you get diagnosed:
"Your dx takes something away from others."

No one is taking anything. There isn't a finite supply of "autism" going around.

@justmichaelaz Decoding issues are quite common. It's also common to lose the start of a sentence by the end. Working memory issues really throw a spanner into the works. I keep it visual, and keep it in front of me.

The most frustrating thing is missing words like "not", "don't".

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Sometimes I see people fighting the same battles I fought and still do fight, and a part of me screams "enough!"

Things should become more accepted, and it should be easier as time goes on.  

But the one constant is that we are taught we do not deserve help. 

That is a lie.

tweet:
We spend our whole lives hiding our own needs and gritting our teeth through discomfort for others. 

It's why we end up eventually wearing ourselves out, and often we don't even know why.

It's internalized ableism. 

On some level we know we are harming ourselves.

tweet:
@DaysAdhd I'm on 36mg Concerta.

1. It will take a hour to kick in

2. There's an initial 3 hour dose, followed by osmotic release for the remainder.  

This means you need to stay hydrated or it will seem like it isn't working. 

DRINK LOTS OF WATER

We gradually wear ourselves down doing so.

3/

tweet:
In school people found me odd and didn't want to hang out with me, but I was intelligent and that meant people would be nice to me if I used my knowledge/ideas to help them.

I'd be kicked to the curb when the project or assignment was over.

But I took what I could get.

2/

tweet:
@ADDeeCee @notfortoast For me, the assessment covered:
- experiences growing up 
- areas of life affected (personal, educational, professional)
- elimination of other potential issues (my psych called it a guided tour of the DSM). 
- self assessment
- getting another close adult to assess you

1/

tweet:
@ADHD_Marie @SlowWaterMvmnt Theses things have similarly bad effects on me: -

- smell of fresh paint / gasoline
- artificial fruit flavor teas (esters)
- ripe bananas
- old food / leftovers
- dairy, eggs, cured meats, certain kinds of alcohols
- dust/cat dander

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
@ADHD_Marie @SlowWaterMvmnt For some people, they have more mast cells, and they are all through the body, and some peoples mast cells are more prone to triggering this response.

So things that might not ruffle a regular person can result in allergic responses/pain for someone with MCAS.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
@ADHD_Marie @SlowWaterMvmnt And I realised that I didn't explain things. 

Everyone has mast cells, and yes they are a part of the immune system.  They release histamine and a bunch of other things that trigger inflammation... think allergies...

tweet: @roryreckons Yes. Words are the way that I encode data. We will seek the most efficient compression for that information, so it makes sense that more dictionary symbols, means more efficient encoding.  Less symbols means that we need more symbol "groupings" for the same information.

I'm not sure I really ever had a good baseline.

#ActuallyAutistic

tweet:
Such subtle fancy never seen,
Too look upon all that's been,
With kindest heart, and truest eye,
To seek ourselves apart the lie

Drop our guard with new-found kin,
Exist a while, without false skin,
Embrace the truth we can't deny,
Then never again embrace a lie.

- monitor my tone
- get my words into a row
- push past the anxiety to hit tweet
- deal with the notifications in response
- believe I have anything to say

It's ok to be quiet.

tweet: If I do the thing that remedies the issue (eg. wash), then I can start to feel my level of overwhelm dropping. Sometimes it might be multiple issues, and it's a question of whether I not I can address them all or just pick off the worst issue.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

tweet: Sometimes I feel overwhelmed and I realize I feel dirty, or too warm, or too cold, or it's too loud. All of these things bring me close to overwhelm, if left unchecked. Sometimes it's hard for me to understand what's up, so I have to ask "Am I x?" until I realize.

tweet:
Am I a variant to be pruned,
To preserve a sacred view,
I think, and feel, and see the world,
Just not the same as you.

Who gets to say I'm wrong,
Notes played upon a different scale,
still constitute a song.

Your worldview should be nixed.

name: Squish 🐙🐟

tweet:
@TamsinCrook @AdultingADHD Rach nailed it once again.

One of the biggest things I've struggled to overcome is the sunk cost fallacy, which definitely applies to ADHDers. I think through a mix of this an internalized ableism, it can really hard to just "let it go", when that is exactly what we need to do.

tweet:
5/ This applies to art as well, but I'm happy to say I've finally found a workflow that works for me. But I feel like others would laugh at it.

But it works for me. 

In the end, isn't that what matters?

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 4/ It was my experience in school and university. My brain would sometimes not grok being told how to do something (hello ADHD, and also PDA), but I could deconstruct problems myself and derive a way of solving the problem. It was right in a non-prescribed way.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 3/ The truth is, the one right way is a lie... not just for neurodivergent people, but for neurotypicals themselves. And yet, often as a society, we value adherence to a method, even over getting the right answer by other valid means.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 2/ I'm amazingly terrible about forgiving myself for struggling, when I know a way works for others, but not for me. Sometimes to work around that I'd come up with tools to assist my issues but feel guilt for doing so, but this was internalized ableism.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
1/ A short thread 🧵about problem solving.

One of the greatest wins I've had recently, since discovering I was ADHD and Autistic, was to let go of stubbornly trying to do things "the right way", and instead giving myself enough grace to figure out "the Squish way".

tweet:
Nothing useful to say and I don't even have the words right now if I did.

- Please see to your needs as much as you can.
  - Hydrate
  - Food if you need
  - Meds

- Please be kind to yourself and to others

Basically, just hydrate and be kind. That's it. Just be kind.

tweet:
The overdraft fees are an absolute shit.

The irony is we also get judged for not doing X.

So that's kind of fucked up, right?

You get to judge us if we do the thing, and you get to judge us if we don't do thing...

How does that work?

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
You judge people based on what they do, yet sometimes they are sacrificing tomorrow or the next week so you, they (or both!) can do X today. 

Imagine everything being a cost benefit analysis. 

Imagine your body/brain is a bank account, and you are sending it into overdraft.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
"But sometimes I see you do X, so your Y can't be that bad!"

Listen... Sometimes I make trade-offs for mine/other peoples benefit knowing I will pay for it later. I do this *knowing* there will be a cost. It doesn't mean it doesn't hurt me, it means I am making a choice.

tweet:
I'm bad at remembering to respond to messages. Before I was diagnosed with #ADHD, I just thought I was a terrible person. 

Now I cut myself slack. 

You should too.

Also, my rejection sensitivity made me afraid to reply. That's still an issue I'm working on, but have hope now.

tweet: Your capacity to deal with stuff is going to vary hugely day to day, week to week, and that's normal, but it's so easy to believe we should be able to do everything. I'm learning more this year to respect my variability, and try to back off when it's too much.

tweet: @GreenRoc It's been on my mind for several days to maybe answer and give a perspective, which I have now done. I do still appreciate peoples curiosity, and I am driven by it, so I felt the need to answer it, at least with one perspective, but it is mine alone.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @GreenRoc All the rhetoric about trans people, I've lived it, and it leaves one with trauma responses. Because one only hears about these beat up media stories, and a lot of misconceptions are peddled about trans people. Anyway, it's been on my mind since, and I stumbled on this tweet.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

tweet: @GreenRoc Total honesty, because I can't be another way... When you unfollowed me a few months ago I went to your TL wondering if I'd offended you somehow and stumbled on some tweets I took personally, and I unfollowed because I felt hurt.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @GreenRoc I know some news outlets paint a devilish picture, particularly in the UK.  There was no sexual component to my need to transition. I guess this is a way of saying I probably still would have. I feel better with my system rid of male hormones, and with female hormones.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @GreenRoc Though I did get teased for not being masculine enough -- a lot. I was also teased for the way I spoke, the way I moved. But my drive to transition was primarily about how others related to me and how I could relate to them.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @GreenRoc To women and girls I related better socially. My primary special interest to this day has been computers. I played with stuffed animals etc and slept with one, but also built things in the yard (mostly electronics). There wasn't really a pressure to confirm to blue or pink etc.

name: Squish 🐙🐟

Everything must be our choice,
For all things have impost,
That which we choose, has invoice,
And we will bear the cost.

in knowledge of risk, reward,
And live with choices made by us,
Not made by another's accord.

It varies in length each day,

And live in ablest thrall.

tweet:
6/ Just be kind if you can. I'm learning this. It's not a pattern most ND folks are accustomed to, because often the world has not been, and we internalize a heck-tonne of ablest BS about ourselves, productivity, and all the things. 

Just be kind. That's it. Just kind.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 5/ So I'm trying to re-evaluate my priorities, say "no" or "not now", and let me brain feel that there are things I "can do", but not so much "must do". Basic care and life admin has to come first, but just enough it's not a looming thing hovering over me in judgement.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 4/ I can't differentiate easily between priorities, and it's hard enough to stay on one task. Couple that with demand avoidance, and the fact that more flustered I get the more everything increases in it's demand gravity, it's a wonder I do anything at all.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: 3/ Which means saying "no", or at least "not today" to people, because the alternative is a constant feeling that I'm drowning, and a brain that's perfectionist, flailing about haplessly as it tries to treat everything as equal importance.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
We need to reduce stigma not perpetuate it.

If I call not watering my plant lazy, and someone else literally is *unable* to do so, how does my judgement of what not watering means for me not come across as ablest?

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
No person is lazy. People judge people to be lazy because they aren't doing what *they* judge they should be doing.

Laziness is a moral judgement. 

Can we stop perpetuating it on ourselves? There is a reason for everything.

#CancelLazy

tweet: @AdhdAngsty @bennessb The mechanism of mast cells -> histamine release -> inflammation explained the symptoms without the presence of an infection. I've spoken to others online with the same issues around that inflammation.

name: Squish 🐙🐟

tweet: @AdhdAngsty @bennessb Mast cells over-release histamine and are generally all over the body, incl. the urinary tract. tweet: So, I was walking into Walmart to buy a couple of items, and thinking about how non-eventful peoples shops were to them vs mine. They did not need to do this. They were just themselves. And the question I was dwelling on was, "Have I ever been myself?".

name: Squish 🐙🐟

tweet: As someone autistic and trans, I'm in a constant state of self-vigilance. Even before transition, I was singled out for how I move, walk, and talk. Comments on how I walked on my toes more, people remarking I "had a stick up my arse". People saying my speech pauses in odd places.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
In Australia, one room in the house was my sanctum.  

There's no place like that right now so I need to figure out strategies to find my quiet. 

This thread is not meant to be anything except a brain dump.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
For me quiet time is hard. 

Smells, brightness, sounds, temperature all impact my sense of 'quiet'. 

Sudden changes are the worst because I can't anticipate, nor control them. 

I can tune the constant things out a bit, even though there is an underlying level of frustration.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Alone time and quiet time aren't the same thing.

Also, quiet time is not just an auditory concept. It also means anything overstimulating or conflicting to our wellbeing is reduced or absent. 

I can have quiet time in the presence of a friend. 

I can be noisily alone.

description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Even so, we still are told we are too much, not enough, too loud, too quiet, too upset, too unemotional, too forgetful, and thoughtless.

For late discovered folks, we've had most of our lives to internalize that. 

It's hard to unlearn.

Be kind to yourself.

2/2

tweet:
Everyday the mail person comes and I have the hopeful optimism that Canadian immigration will have stated they accepted my application again.

Losing 6 months to #ADHD inattentiveness (messing up forms) is a lesson to folks that think it doesn't affect all aspects of our lives.

tweet: Why am I thinking about this?... because even today, people make judgements based on things like this. It's wrong, it's frustrating and it hurts. The people who do, often don't face invisible barriers, and they judge based on their own experiences, and it's wrong.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: If I could understand it as a program, I could figure it out and I got an added kick of interest because I loved using computers so much. But if you looked at that kid, struggling with their homework in the wee hours of the morning, you wouldn't know I was smart.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: But words! Words were just the opposite, I was good with words, with writing, and reading -- provided it interested me.  But English and math were poles apart for me. Computers helped me bridge the gaps with numbers a bit because I could write tools to help me.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: In high school, I was routinely up until 1-2am in the morning completing homework. I struggled with focus, attention, numbers were terrible for me. A lot was the (then) undiagnosed ADHD, and also what I suspect is dyscalculia.

It's ok.

tweet:
"Why can't you just listen?"

Silence says I know better than to resist,
Instead, hanging head, hiding tremors,
Endless instruction, washing over me, lost,
I can't hold them, evaporative cognizance,
Cycle begins anew, I shall err again,
Tired of taking the fall for ADHD.

tweet: @NeuroPoetica That being said, some women naturally have more receptors than their body produces estrogen to bind to, and ofc that tapers off as one approached menopause. In those cases supplemental estrogen can benefit for multiple reasons.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

tweet: @NeuroPoetica You've only got so many estrogen receptors in the body.  So above a certain amount of estrogen in the system, it won't be absorbed and you'll pee it out. You also need progesterone as well generally. So there's an effective ceiling.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Not everyone is the same, and some people use a combination of styles, and some find that reading and rote learning works well for them. 

I'm curious if others have thoughts on what learning styles for them.

-- Squish 23/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I find that the related topics are much easier to recall if I can find the a practical relationship to something that engages me. 22/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Have you ever had a realization when looking at a new topic that "hey, it's a lot like this other thing I know or like"? 

Those are wonderful rabbit holes to go down because we are leveraging our own brains interest and connections to create and absorb new information. 21/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
The flipside is true, which is leveraging an enjoyable activity in a way that helps us process the new information.

The point here is that you leverage an existing area or areas of interest or understanding to learning something new. 20/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Rote learning is hard, but if we can engage in that learning in a self-directed way that provides practical application to our own interests, that is so much easier. 19/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
The other one I wanted to touch upon is what is referred to as Tangential Learning.  I find I can learn the best when I'm inspired to learn about something by participating in or relating it to another activity that I enjoy. 

Thus the tangent. 18/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
@InsertKABOOM has a fantastic video on self-talk. It's well worth a look: 

https://t.co/VXHmhS5Inj 17/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
It also helps cycle thoughts with my poor working memory, it helps me hear and externalize my ideas. 

But also sometimes it's words and phrases that help me process with non-obvious relationship to the thing I'm processing. 16/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I can't visualize anything voluntarily, so most of my internal processing is verbal. 

There's always a narrator for my thoughts, and sometimes that narration, that self-talk is external -- it's a useful thing. 15/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
It's quite possible for this to go hand in hand with other types as well.  

I'm an verbal processor/learner as well, and so I'll verbalize at the same time quite often when I'm absorbing or processing information. 14/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
* Using your hands when communicating information

* Pacing, swaying or otherwise moving when reasoning or thinking through problems or trying to understand concepts

* Picking up and feeling new things when learning about them. 13/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Some signs you *might* be an kinesthetic learner: -

* Repeated physical motion (bouncing your knees, tapping a pen, clicking a pen)

* Physical motions when preparing for an activity (cracking knuckles, I drop my arms and flap my hands quite often). 12/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Regardless, there's a name for this learning style: Kinesthetic Learning. 11/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: It's physical engagement in this case whilst learning. I think this is common for ADHDers, and some might argue the physical action is a fidget that aids in keeping focus on processing the new information. 10/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Maybe it's the steps to make an origami swan, maybe I'm just writing them out.  

I'm not performing the steps, but using movement (the pen) while I'm processing them.  This seems to help the steps stick in a similar way. Doodling generally as well helps. 9/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
What is creating the memory is the movement / action itself, and it doesn't have to be the exact specific physical actions itself. 

I can also learn while doing other movements. A common one is writing / sketching the concepts. 8/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
But it applied later in life too, when learning computing techniques, art techniques and other things. 

But it's not just about "doing the thing" for me, not just about memorizing a bunch of motor skills. 7/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
You can show me how to make an origami swan, but unless I make the swan myself, using my hands, the feel of my finger tips then I won't remember.  

It's how I learned to do this, and how I learned simple tasks. 6/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Physically performing or manipulating the item or task in question seems to help it gel in a way that just doesn't happen with rote learning or demonstrated learning. 5/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
The word NOT is invisible to me often. 😅

The most productive way for me to learn is to do the thing, because the physicality of the act, learning in motion helps me to form the pathways to retain it. 4/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
I've always said to people that I learn a lot better by doing. My ADHD means that telling me how to do something just isn't enough. 

I won't absorb all the information, or may miss decoding key details, turning an instruction into it's exact opposite, for example. 3/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: It's pretty common for neurodivergent folks to not learn in the same way as neurotypical folks. 2/23

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Let's talk about learning. 

This thread 🧵 is kind of adapted from a blog post I wrote some time ago, with some addition thoughts I've had since then.

Been sitting on it for a few weeks and figure I'll never finish it unless I post it haha.

FYI: These are my experiences. 1/23

Not the end, or all-defining,
But when you have been told such,
Act hurt, resort to whining,

And your fans rush in to aid,
And in resulting maelstrom,
To rest, good voices, laid.

tweet:
Megaphone (a poem)

Privilege is a megaphone,
Drowning all things out,
And when you have been told this,
The louder you then shout,

But if you would just listen,
You might be sure to hear,
Different voices than your own,
And it would become clear,

1/3

I don't even know if I took my ADHD meds today.

Everything will be there tomorrow.

💜 5/5

2/2

name: Squish 🐙🐟

1/2

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
There are days when I feel lonely,
And the days when I feel loved,
Sometimes they're the same days,
It depends on tweets above,

There are days when I know little,
And the days I'm less confused,
Sometimes they're the same days,
To this brain that life abused.

tweet:
@christammiller I suspect we try and adapt to those we are communicating with.  I think we are more likely to start an interaction in our own style and switch if we feel there are difficulties. 

But if someone else initiates we already are at that first response point, and may adapt.

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Kludges often miss edge cases. Fine for 80% of cases, but it's the 20% that cause catastrophic results.  

Being ND is being a cross between a software dev and the "I don't know what I'm doing" dog, but you hack on yourself until you mostly work, and hope you don't crash.

3/3

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
The problem with this, is kludging it without understanding why the software is the way it is... One day those kludges are going to come crashing down around your ears, as everything runs off the rails. Software was ok, just suited to a different set of inputs and outputs.

2/3

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
In software dev sometimes software doesn't behave the way people expect. There's a bad tendency to layer on kludges (dodgy fixes) to alter the behavior to suit. My software was different, not wrong. I layered behavioral kludges on top to make it like what people expected.

1/3 https://t.co/KBWwOrInq0

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Disclaimer. 

I created this thread to entertain, based on my addled high school brain, googling and a little creative license.  

The goal is to get you to drink some water.  

Please do that for me.  

Water is awesome.

💜 17/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Let's appreciate water.  

- It's part of you. 
- It helps you function. 
- It makes rainbows.
- Ice is just plain weird and good in drinks.
- What other molecule inspired a temperature scale?
- On Earth, having it is a pretty big deal.

So drink a big toast to water. 16/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Finally, water is also essential for delivering nutrients to the brain and for removing toxins. When the brain is fully hydrated, the exchange of nutrients and toxins is more efficient, ensuring better concentration and mental alertness.

This is a good thing. 15/17

description:

It changes state, and goes through cycles of evaporation, condensation and precipitation.  There's water in the air you breathe, BUT NOT ENOUGH INSIDE OF YOU.  

DRINK MORE WATER. 13/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: The Earths surface is approximately 71% water, but accounts for approximately 0.02 percent of it's mass. The amount of water on the Earth has remained relatively static for billions of years. 12/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Interestingly, this transition affects light differently depending on wavelength, so can act as a prism and change the path of different wavelengths of light by differing amounts. 

This is called dispersion. 

Without water you'd be dead and would not have rainbows. 11/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Speaking of density. Why does stuff look weird when you look through your glass of water? 

Water is more dense than air, and as light passes between densities, it is refracted, this changes the path of the light as it transits the boundary, thus distorting the image. 10/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
This is because the positive Hydrogen nuclei come into play exert a force which repels and causes the molecules to settle into a stable lattice structure. 

This structure spaces out the atoms more than the liquid state above 4C, and since it is less dense, ice floats. 9/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet: As you approach 0C (freezing), things get denser, and heavier, but once it goes below 4C, it gets goofy and starts to expand again. 8/17

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Water has a freezing point of 32F or 0C, and a boiling point of 212F or 100C (at sea level). If you aren't sure what sea level is, find an ocean. 

The Celsius scale deliberately uses the freezing and boiling points of water because water is cool. 4/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Oxygen atoms are electronegative and have 6 valence (outer shell) electrons and attract the electrons in the Hydrogen via a covalent bond.  

This allows oxygen to reach a stable configuration of 8 electrons in the outer shell by sharing 2 electrons from the hydrogen atoms. 3/17

name: Squish 🐙🐟
description:
ADHD, Autistic. Kindness is not weakness.

#ADHDAutism #Autacity #ActuallyAutistic #AllAutistics #CancelLazy #MCAS #NEISVoid #OCD 🏳️‍⚧️🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Water is known by the molecular formula H2O, which means 2 atoms of Hydrogen to one of Oxygen.  

Oxygen has 8 protons and Hydrogen 1, so water has 10 protons in total per molecule (8+1+1). 2/17

Trash

TW: pet death

Many times I felt alone, he'd appear. 😢🐱
